name: The (Un)controllable Game
description:
PC PORT COMMING SOON

A game where you control a AI that can go against your favor. You only instruct the player where to go, and it goes there on it's own. But on the way there is various obstacles.

Since this app was designed to be made on google play, it's android (currently in the closed testing branch) I will leave some of the bigger updates here. And uploading here is instant, since you don't have to wait for some dude to verify it. So there will be updates here untill I publish a public release on google play.
